         full: whether to compute full loss, i. e. to add the Stirling
             approximation term. Default: ``False``
             :math:`\text{target} * \log(\text{target}) - \text{target} + 0.5 * \log(2 * \pi * \text{target})`.
-        size_average: By default, the losses are averaged over observations for

+        size_average (bool, optional): Deprecated (see :attr:`reduction`). By default,
body:
here and other docs: do you want to deprecate `size_average` and `reduce`? If so, I have two suggestions:
1. move them below `reduction` in doc
2. raise deprecation warning if people use old api.
